org.pepstock.charba.client

Class JsChartHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.JsChartHelper

  • final class JsChartHelper
extends Object
    This is a singleton wrapper for Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation with some utilities to invoke CHART.JS callbacks, provided out of the box, the default one.
    This wrapper is necessary to ensure that script is injected with CHART.JS.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static JsChartHelper get()
        Singleton object to get the helper instance
        Returns:
        helper instance.

      • generateDefaultLabels

        List<LegendLabelItem> generateDefaultLabels(Chart chart,
                                            ChartOptions options)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box, invoking generateLabels function property.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of legend labels or an empty list if chart is not initialized.

      • invokeDefaultLegendEvent

        void invokeDefaultLegendEvent(ChartOptions options,
                              Key key,
                              Chart context,
                              NativeObject event,
                              NativeObject item)
        Invokes the legend event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        key - the key of options which should have the event callback
        context - chart instance, used as function context
        event - native object of event wrapper from user interface
        item - legend item native

      • invokeDefaultChartEvent

        void invokeDefaultChartEvent(ChartOptions options,
                             Key key,
                             Chart context,
                             NativeObject event,
                             ArrayObject items)
        Invokes the chart event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        key - the key of options which should have the event callback
        context - chart instance, used as function context
        event - native object of event wrapper from user interface
        items - array of datasets native objects

      • setTooltipActiveElements

        void setTooltipActiveElements(Chart chart,
                              ArrayObject elements)
        Sets the active tooltip elements for the chart.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance, used to get the tooltip
        elements - array of active tooltip elements

      • getTooltipActiveElements

        ArrayObject getTooltipActiveElements(Chart chart)
        Returns the active tooltip elements for the chart.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance, used to get the tooltip
        Returns:
        the array of active tooltip elements
